lead_paragraph: The editor of The New York Post spent 42 years at News Corporation, the owner of the newspaper.

headline.print_headline: Col Allan, Longtime Editor, to Retire From The Post
headline.main: Col Allan, Longtime Editor of The New York Post, to Retire

snippet: The editor of The New York Post spent 42 years at News Corporation, the owner of the newspaper.
abstract: Longtime New York Post editor Col Allen says he will retire at end of May after 42 years at News Corporation.
